creator: apachetomcat@gmx.net
text:
We encountered that "%20"-characters (encoded spaces) in URI-Parameters are 
omitted by Tomcat. 
an URI containing 
...&PARAM=This%20is%20a%20hashed%20message
results in 
PARAM=Thisisahashedmessage 

which is -in the context of a hash- fatal

creator: apachetomcat@gmx.net
text:
This problem turned out to be produced by a malconfigured server sending 
inconsistent requests to Tomcat.
